EmailTemplate.name: October Fest Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Oktober Fest 2012
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Guangzhou Part of The British Schools Group
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Please find below details of the upcoming Oktoberfest Festival that will be held in GZ 23rd September.
Please note this is not a school event. We are simply passing on details as many in the expat community have expressed interest in attending this annual festival.
Please click here for further information.
Kind regards,
Administration Team The British School of Guangzhou World Class Education
_________________________________________________________ Member of The British Schools Group- University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Member of The Federation of British International School of South East Asia - Member of the Conference of British International Schools - Licensed by the Chinese Ministry of Education
